summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: `frontend/index.html` now contains `<title>Aswin-Resume</title>`. No evidence in the provided diff summary suggests other UI text was changed. However, there are additional non-requested file modifications to project metadata/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state tracking entries unrelated to changing the HTML document title.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the `<title>` in `frontend/index.html`; it did not request updates to project tracking files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified generated/frontend file summary listing many application components.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to documentation/summary artifacts; only `frontend/index.html` title update was required.
